entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gander
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:59 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -17.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gander Int'l Airport 12:30 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -17.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -23.2°C
Wind: SW 51 km/h gust 69 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning early this evening and ending overnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 near midnight then west 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the morning then rising.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the morning then rising. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
